title: ISic020448. ISic020448
body:
1τᾶς Καλικράτεος Μεννάδος ε̄̓μί

l.1 reg., orig. ΚΑΛΙΚΡΑΤΕΟΣΚαλικράτεος

1ΤΑΣΚΑΛΙΚΡΑΤΕΟΣΜΕΝΝΑΔΟΣΕ̄ΜΙ

l.1 reg., orig. ΚΑΛΙΚΡΑΤΕΟΣΚαλικράτεος

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Arena 1989 (IGASM I) ;
  • Tusa: Καλικράτεος Μένναρός ε̄̓μι. ;
  • Villa: Μενναδο͂ς.

English translation

Valentina Mignosa

I am (the krater) of Mennados (son) of Kallikratos.

Italian translation

Valentina Mignosa

Sono (il cratere) di Mennados (figlio) di Kallikratos.

commentary

The first mu (initial of the name Μεννάδος) seems to have a very different ductus from the second one (in ε̄̓μί): the difference could be explained, according to Arena, by assuming an intervention by the writer who would have written a pi at first and then amended it to mu. The name Μεννάδος is not elsewhere attested.

bibliography

  • Tusa 1971 27, pl. 6d https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001534
  • Villa 1979 64ff., fig. 1, pl. 12, figs. 1-2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001461
  • Arena 1989 74, fig. 12 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000638
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
